properties.description: This pipe loads ACDOCA from EXT to STG to RAW to BIZ to INFOMART
This pipe loads ACDOCA from EXT to STG to RAW to BIZ to INFOMART
Incremental Load Pipe with the load logic to join to an external cdc table

activities.name: FullLoadCopyData
activities.description: Full Load to move data from SAP to SQL Landing Zone

preCopyScript.value:
IF OBJECT_ID(@{concat('''','[',pipeline().parameters.TargetSchemaName,']','.','[',pipeline().parameters.TargetEntityName,']','''')}) IS NOT NULL
BEGIN
TRUNCATE TABLE 
@{concat('[',pipeline().parameters.TargetSchemaName,']','.','[',pipeline().parameters.TargetEntityName,']')} 
END

activities.name: EventLog
activities.description: Logs the results of the copy activity

activities.name: ErrorLog
activities.description: Logs the errors of the copy activity

activities.name: StartFullLoad
activities.description: Write the Start Time to the LoadConfigs

properties.description: Gets the Load Configurations from the Azure instance

activities.name: FullLoadCopyData
activities.description: Full Load to move data from SAP to SQL Landing Zone

preCopyScript.value:
IF OBJECT_ID(@{concat('''','[',variables('TargetSchemaName'),']','.','[',variables('TargetEntityName'),']','''')}) IS NOT NULL
BEGIN
TRUNCATE TABLE 
@{concat('[',variables('TargetSchemaName'),']','.','[',variables('TargetEntityName'),']')} 
END
